meanings.sent1: The old clock in the hallway was unprogressive, never moving its hands.
meanings.sent2: The unprogressive project had been stuck in the same phase for months.
meanings.sent3: The unprogressive turtle refused to take even a single step forward.
meanings.sent4: Her unprogressive mindset was like a heavy anchor holding her back.
meanings.sent5: The unprogressive pond was covered in a thick layer of algae, showing no signs of change.

meanings.definition: Opposed to or resistant to progress or change.
meanings.sent1: The unprogressive teacher insisted on using outdated teaching methods.
meanings.sent2: His unprogressive views on technology made it difficult for him to adapt.
meanings.sent3: The unprogressive cat refused to try the new brand of food, sticking to its old ways.
meanings.sent4: Her unprogressive attitude was like a wall blocking any new ideas from coming in.
meanings.sent5: The unprogressive town council rejected every proposal for change, clinging to tradition.
